It is a must play, really good game!
amazing game. i love this game so much. i like that there is multiplayer
The nostalgia will kill me eventually.
The gameplay togheter with the dark and dry humor makes this game the best. Highly recomended if you like puzzle games. just remember to play the first one first.
Игра мне очень понравилась. Интересный, но иногда предсказуемый сюжет. Над некоторыми головоломками надо поломать голову. Кооп карты так ещё сложнее..
нужна 200 300 або 1000 iq, лучше играть в двайом  гаварю игра норм ну после 2 3 часов игры станет скучно
Najlepsza gra logiczna singleplayer, a coop jeszcze lepszy. Czekam na portal 3 ale chyba sie nie doczekam

Игра не плохая, но местами была скучновата. Проходил в одиночку и в кооперативе. Для своего времени игра красивая, проблем с оптимизацией не обнаружил. Сложных головоломок тут почти нет, в основном задания требуют внимательности, нежели сообразительности. Кооператив в игре хороший, основная игра в нём простая, а испытания лютый дроч. Я не любитель этого жанра, но в целом игра оставила приятные эмоции, своих денег однозначно стоит. 6/10
If you have not played this game play it, it is good.

Historia fantastica, es gracioso a su manera, los puzzles son realmente divertidos ademas que el modo historia en cooperativo de igual manera es divertidisima, totalmente recomendable, si buscas un juego de puzzles para jugar solo o con 1 amigo con una buena historia
Świetna gra, polecam wszystkim. Chciałbym zobaczyć kolejną odsłonę a może nawet osobną grę, rozwijającą przygodę Chell

I like solving puzzles. Think this is pretty cool. After the first 30 mins, I had to refer to Youtube for a walkthrough. Haha. 

I dislike the portal-sickness. I did not expect to feel nausea whenever I get stuck. So I can't play this game for long. It's unexpectedly good for controlling appetite.
Great story, fun puzzles. Just replayed the main story again after pre-ordering when it came out. still one of my favorite games.
Oyun 10 sene öncesine ait olmasına rağmen grafik,mekanik ve oynanış olarak çok güzel duruyor. Benim gibi bilim kurguyu ve beyin çalıştırmayı sevenler için mükemmel bir oyun :)
One of the best puzzle game that I have played. Everyone must try this game once.
verry fun game but some of the puzzels required me to use a youtube bideo

Étape 1. Préchauffez votre four à 180°C (thermostat 6). ...
Étape 2. Dans un saladier, ajoutez le sucre, les oeufs, la farine. ...
Étape 3. Ajoutez le mélange chocolat/beurre. ...
Étape 4. Beurrez et farinez votre moule puis y versez la pâte à gâteau.
Étape 5. Faites cuire au four environ 20 minutes.
Étape 6. Etre QLF
关卡设计极其精巧，自己打了一点，打算之后找基友一起来玩。

This is absolutely my favorite puzzle game. The puzzle is very fun, the story is okay but there is a lot of funny and goofy stuff in it. Don't want to spoil it. Just play it yourself. It's totally worth it.
very good game very smart man yes

Best puzzle game I have ever played, and much more than merely a puzzle game. Great story, environments, puzzles, gameplay, and divine music. And a bombastic climax.

It's fame is legendary for a reason.

Excelente pra queimar muitos neurônios na campanha principal solo, duo, desafios e as câmaras da comunidade criada por gente perturbada.

Se quer queimar mais neurônios ainda, jogue o Portal reloaded pra adicionar um fodendo portal temporal...
游戏很好玩，非常佩服游戏作者的脑洞，力推Portal 2

I've done the single player storyline so many times now and I still enjoy it, even though u know how a story ends it doesn't make it any less fun to watch. Creating and designing test chambers are still on my to do list though, lol.
I never thought puzzle games could be this good. The game is too short sadly.
